item.title: Getting Started with SIMD Computation
item.description: Introduction SIMD stands for Single Instruction Multiple Data. SIMD is a parallel computing technique where a single instruction operates on multiple data points simultaneously, improving performance for tasks involving repetitive (Instruction) calculations.

item.title: What changed in WPC 1.0? a lot.
item.description: Introduction WPC 1.0 has been released and with a whole set of new features and most importantly readable, refactored and saner code which should make things easy for any hackers/tinkerers out there.

item.title: Overview of WPC: Writing a wallpaper changer in Rust
item.description: WPC stands for Wall Paper Changer Github Changelog (09-07-2020) WPC v0.
